CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 21, reads: "4. Mrs. Marjorie Scott, winner of the Good Samaritan Bible, presented by Maurice Contay"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Maurice Contay presenting Marjorie Scott,with the winning copy of the Good Samaritan Bible, posed in front of cooking demonstration area with other men and women, including Jessie Vann, for the Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair in the Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Exhibit booths--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Books--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Vann, Jessie, 1889-1967.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
